description:
OPTIMIZATION is the word of the day!

Learn the basics on making smarter business decisions with this awesome Excel tool.

If you`re an MBA student, manager, business owner or simply someone who understands the importance of Optimal Decision Making, this short tutorial is the way to go!

In just 30 minutes we guarantee you`ll be on your way to optimizing production, minimizing costs and most importantly: Maximizing Profit!
title: Optimal Business Decisions using Excel Solver
